articles.title: If David Warner gets a lifetime ban on captaincy, why doesn't Steve Smith? Questions Ian Chappell - India Today
articles.description: Steve Smith is eligible to lead Australia again after serving out his 2-year ban from captaincy while David Warner will never be considered for the post even though both players were involved in the sandpapergate scandal in South Africa.
